title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Domestics' Rooms, Plans/ Furniture Layout", May 19, 1937
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: DOMESTICS ROOMS/SCALE 1/4"=1'0"/RESIDENCE MR. H.A. ANDERSON; lower right: MAY 19-1937; inscribed in graphite with labels and numbers.
description: Floor plans and furniture layout for domestics' rooms. Two maid's rooms at upper center with beds, dressers, closets, and other furniture. Larger room below with day bed (by other), upholstered chair, table, dresser and other furniture.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Domestics' Rooms, Plans/ Furniture Layout", May 19, 1937.
May 19, 1937. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-622.
